title: So I was watching an EUW stream

replies.body:
Be the change you want to see :3 Generally speaking, the average person is probably neutral; they don't harass other players, but they don't thank and compliment them either. The initial behavior exhibited paves the way for the other players in a match, so being positive yourself makes it more likely the rest of the players will remain positive.
https://i.gyazo.com/13280fe1b2f2f04b794b6d4683ae3219.png
